element.name: ReturnBy
element.desc: The date and time that this item is due to be returned.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of fine assessed to this patron and item. A corresponding ItemInfo is required for all FineInfo types except "Other" and "Refund" where it is permissible to omit the ItemInfo element if there isn't an item associated with the fine.

element.name: Assessed
element.desc: The date and time that this fine was assessed to the patron.

element.name: Description
element.desc: More detailed information concerning the assessed fine or refund.

element.name: Amount
element.desc: The current balance of the fine expressed as a positive number.

element.name: Reference
element.desc: An application-specific reference identifier for the fine being assessed, paid, or refunded. It is intended to identify a specific fine transaction allowing consumers to include this information in Billing or Payment events sent to the library application.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: The type of hold being referenced.

element.name: DatePlaced
element.desc: The date that the patron placed the hold.

element.name: DateNeeded
element.desc: The date that the patron needs this item by.

element.name: MadeAvailable
element.desc: The date that this item became available for the patron to pick up.

element.name: Expires
element.desc: The date when this ready hold will expire freeing the item to be assigned to another patron.

value.name: READY
value.desc: (which means that a previously placed hold is ready for the patron to pick up at the library desk)

value.name: NOTREADY
value.desc: (hold has been placed but hasn't been fulfilled yet)

element.name: Title
element.desc: The title of the item being referenced by this Transaction.

element.name: Author
element.desc: The author of the item being referenced by this Transaction.

element.name: ElectronicId
element.desc: Electronic identifier associated with this Transaction.

element.name: CallNumber
element.desc: The library call number, if any, assigned to this item.

element.name: Price
element.desc: The cost of this item.

attribute.name: LibraryType
attribute.desc: A library-defined language-independent value that refers to a specific patron type.

attribute.name: SIF_RefId
attribute.desc: The SIF wide unique identifier of a student or teacher.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The type of patron mapped to a SIF supported object. Library automation products work with patrons who could be students or teachers.

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: This is an open list with no primary key.

element.name: NumberOfCheckouts
element.desc: The total number of items that this patron currently has checked out including overdue items.

element.name: NumberOfOverdues
element.desc: The total number of checkouts that are currently overdue.

element.name: NumberOfFines
element.desc: The total number of fines currently assessed to this patron.

element.name: FineAmount
element.desc: The total monetary amount of the fines that this patron currently owes the library expressed as a positive number.

element.name: NumberOfRefunds
element.desc: The total number of refunds currently credited to this patron.

element.name: RefundAmount
element.desc: The total monetary amount of the refunds that the library currently owes the patron expressed as a positive number.

attribute.name: Priority
attribute.desc: The level of urgency associated with this message.

element.name: Sent
element.desc: The date and time that this message was originally sent.

element.name: Text
element.desc: The contents of the message.
